mapper.insert: insert into TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA(id, train_data_id, train_data_name, train_data_url, train_data_path, train_data_type, add_time, TRAIN_DATA_FILE_NAME,TRAIN_COURSE_ID,ANSWER_ID) values (#{id},#{trainDataId},#{trainDataName},#{trainDataUrl}, #{trainDataPath},#{trainDataType},#{addTime},#{trainDataFileName},#{trainCourseId},#{answerId})
mapper.update:
update TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA
train_data_id = #{trainDataId},
train_data_name = #{trainDataName},
train_data_url = #{trainDataUrl},
train_data_path = #{trainDataPath},
train_data_type = #{trainDataType},
TRAIN_DATA_FILE_NAME = #{trainDataFileName},
TRAIN_COURSE_ID = #{trainCourseId},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select ID,TRAIN_DATA_NAME,TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA.ADD_TIME,TRAIN_DATA_URL,ANSWER_ID,TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA.TRAIN_COURSE_ID,TRAIN_COURSE_NAME from TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA,TF_EL_TRAIN_COURSE where TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA.TRAIN_COURSE_ID = TF_EL_TRAIN_COURSE.TRAIN_COURSE_ID
mapper.delete: delete from ( select 1 from TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA td,USER_TRAIN_DATA_RELA tdr,TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA_ANSWER tda,TF_EL_ANSWER_SHEET ash,TF_EL_EVALUATION e where td.id = tdr.DATA_ID and td.ANSWER_ID = tda.ANSWER_ID and tdr.ANSWER_SHEET_ID = ash.ANSWER_SHEET_ID and ash.EVALUATION_ID = e.EVALUATION_ID and td.ID = #{id} )
mapper.select: select TRAIN_DATA_URL,TRAIN_ANSWER_URL,TRAIN_SHEET_URL from TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA,TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA_ANSWER,USER_TRAIN_DATA_RELA,TF_EL_ANSWER_SHEET where TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA.ANSWER_ID = TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA_ANSWER.ANSWER_ID and TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA.ID = DATA_ID and USER_TRAIN_DATA_RELA.ANSWER_SHEET_ID = TF_EL_ANSWER_SHEET.ANSWER_SHEET_ID and TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA.ID = #{id}

select id,TRAIN_COURSE_ID,TRAIN_COURSE_NAME from TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA,TF_EL_TRAIN_COURSE where TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA.TRAIN_COURSE_ID = TF_EL_TRAIN_COURSE.TRAIN_COURSE_ID group by TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA.TRAIN_COURSE_ID

select TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA.id, TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA.train_data_name, TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA.train_data_type, TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA.train_data_file_name, TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA.train_course_id, TRAIN_COURSE_NAME, TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA_ANSWER.answer_id, TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA_ANSWER.train_answer_type, TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA_ANSWER.train_data_file_name as trainAnswerFileName from TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA,TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA_ANSWER,TF_EL_TRAIN_COURSE where TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA.ANSWER_ID = TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA_ANSWER.ANSWER_ID and TF_EL_TRAIN_DATA.TRAIN_COURSE_ID = TF_EL_TRAIN_COURSE.TRAIN_COURSE_ID and ID = #{id}
